requirements.summary: Create frontend interface with input fields for Instagram and Facebook video URLs
acceptanceCriteria: User can paste Instagram video URLs into an input field
User can paste Facebook video URLs into an input field
Input validation shows clear error messages for invalid URLs
Interface clearly indicates which platforms are supported

file_operations.description: Create main video downloader component with input fields for Instagram and Facebook URLs, platform selection UI, URL validation logic showing clear error messages for invalid formats, and visual indicators for supported platforms
Create URL validation utility to check Instagram and Facebook URL formats, returning validation status and error messages for invalid URLs
Wire VideoDownloader component into the main App, replacing existing placeholder content with the video downloader interface

requirements.summary: Provide download functionality allowing users to save processed videos to their local device
acceptanceCriteria: User can trigger download after video is processed
Downloaded file has appropriate video format and extension

file_operations.description: Add download trigger functionality that calls backend methods (getInstagramDownloadLink or getFacebookDownloadLink), processes the returned download URL, initiates browser download with appropriate filename and extension, and displays loading states with clear feedback during the download process

Create custom hook to manage video download state (loading, error, success), call backend interface methods based on platform, handle download URL response, trigger browser download, and provide status feedback to the UI
Create status component displaying download progress, success messages with completed download information, and error messages with retry options for failed downloads

requirements.summary: Design modern interface with creative color scheme (avoiding blue and purple), clear typography, and intuitive layout emphasizing simplicity
acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses a cohesive, non-blue/purple color palette
Layout guides users naturally through the download process
Visual design is consistent across all pages and components

file_operations.description: Configure custom color palette avoiding blue and purple (using warm tones like orange, green, or red-based schemes), define typography scale with clear, readable font settings, and establish consistent spacing and border radius tokens for the interface

Apply global typography styles with clear readability, set background colors using the custom palette, define consistent component styling patterns, and ensure visual consistency across the application

Create hero section component with background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, app title and tagline, and visual branding that guides users to the download interface
Wire HeroSection component above VideoDownloader, creating a natural visual flow from branding to functionality within the existing single-page layout
Place generated hero background image with abstract gradient pattern at this location for use as static asset in HeroSection component
Place generated download icon representing video download concept at this location for use in VideoDownloader component as visual indicator
